data.name: WhatsApp - Inverted
data.description:
Inverts all colors except for images and videos.

Also makes the sidebar (with the contacts list) automatically resize when you hover over it, so that there's more space for the messages.

This style also removes the notifications above the contact list. If you prefer to keep those, remove the "display: none;" line in the code where it says "annoying message".

data.name: Prometheus Dark Style
Zorse Dark Theme
Dark Github Hover Card
data.description: A Dark Theme for "Github Hover Card" chrome extension. Compatible with "Material Dark Github" (Darker) style. Hover Card Extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/github-hovercard/mmoahbbnojgkclgceahhakhnccimnplk Style: Dark-Github-Hover-Card-for-stylish

data.name: Orb's Dark Hacker News v1.2
data.description: Custom and COMPLETE conversion of YCombinator's Hacker News aggregation site into a subtle and "easy on the eyes" dark version.  I tried to keep it mostly identical to the original site, but with slight size/DPI increases to some elements and color emphasis added to the most important functionalities of the site.

user.name: Baila Con Mer Yt Dance Yt

data.name: Complete Google Search Font Fix
data.description: Revert the large text change for google's searches so you can continue to search at a better efficiency as you've always done before. Added changes for the new google layout, as well as compatibility for https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/395257-better-google to restore google to it's original look.

data.name: Dracula Wikipedia
data.description: A port of the popular Dracula theme for Wikipedia.
